{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=FVG318 |revision=v1 |upc=606449041668 |asin=B000B5LQCA |fcc_date=10/17/2005 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |availability=EoL |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY305200007 |ic_id=4054A-05200007 |pcb_id=TN00F-1.6M |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2316A |cpu1_cspeed=184 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=STMicroelectronics |fla1_model=25P32V6P |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=ProMOS |ram1_model=V54C3128164VEI6 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, J500 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, JP1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2316A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060;(2x); |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=8 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os=VxWorks |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=NETGEAR, |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=00:1F:33,20:4E:7F,E0:46:9A |oui_eth=00:1F:33,20:4E:7F,E0:46:9A }} {{TagLine|ProSafe 802.11g Wireless VPN Firewall}} {{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=FVG318v1|vs_id=2415}}
*[http://wiki.openwrt.org/doku.php?id=oldwiki:openwrtdocs:hardware:netgear:fvg318 On the OpenWrt wiki]
This device has two ''[[Marvell]]'' 88E6060 switches for 8 LAN ports.
===Serial=== The serial port is located on JP1: :Pin 1: Vcc (+3.3V) :Pin 2: Rx :Pin 3: Tx :Pin 4: Ground (GND) Speed is 9600.
==Images== <gallery caption="[[User:RayKnight|RayKnight]]'s unit"> File:FVG318-1.JPG|PCB top File:FVG318-2.JPG|Box top </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
